dialogueLines.line: Hello, Mister! Are you here for the Spooky Month?
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Are you here for the spooky dance?
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: What? Spooky dance? No, that sounds completely idiotic.
dialogueLines.speaker: dad

dialogueLines.line: You're already here. Why not do the spooky dance with us?
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: We promise it won't take long.
dialogueLines.speaker: skid
